requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955, Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change. SOME BUSINESS LAPTOPS WITH INTEGRATED GRAPHIC CARD WERE ABLE TO RUN THIS GAME ON A VERY LOW GRAPHICS SETTINGS, AS WE IMPLEMENTED SPECIAL FEATURE WHICH RESCALES THE RESOLUTION. FEEL FREE TO CHECK IF YOU ACHIEVE STABLE 60 FPS ON LOW END MACHINES WHILE FREE DEMO IS AVAILABLE. 60 FPS IS NEEDED FOR SMOOTH GAMEPLAY AND IS MANDATORY FOR ONLINE GAME. PLEASE BE ADVICED THAT THE GAME, IN LOW OR VERY LOW GRAPHICS SETTINGS, DOESN'T REPRESENT FULL PRODUCT VALUE.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: AMD FX-6130 Six-Core, Intel Core i5-4440S 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.
